original: 穢跡金剛說神通大滿陀羅尼法
analyzed: 穢跡金剛說神通大滿陀羅尼法
translated: The Usnīsa of the Adamantine One's Great Fulfillment Dhāraṇī
The Essential Methods in One Fascicle

original: 北天竺國三藏沙門阿質
analyzed: 北天竺國三藏沙門阿質
translated: Tripiṭaka Master Aśvaghoṣa🔽from Northern India, translated by Amoghadarśin

original: 達霰唐言無能勝將譯如是我聞。
analyzed: 達霰唐言無能勝將譯如是我聞。
translated: Thus have I heard.

original: 一時佛在拘尸那國力士生處跋提河邊娑羅雙樹間。
analyzed: 一時佛在拘尸那國力士生處跋提河邊娑羅雙樹間。
translated: Once the Buddha was in the country of Kuśinagara, at the place of birth of the strong men, by the side of the Hiraṇyavatī River, between the twin śāla trees.
At that time, the Tathāgata was about to enter nirvāṇa.

original: 是時有無量百千萬眾天龍八部人非人等。
analyzed: 是時有無量百千萬眾天龍八部人非人等。
translated: At that time, there were innumerable hundreds of thousands of myriads of multitudes of devas, nāgas, the eight classes of beings, humans, non-humans, and others.

original: 啼泣向佛四面哽咽悲惱而住。
analyzed: 啼泣向佛四面哽咽悲惱而住。
translated: Weeping towards the Buddha, they choked with sobs on all four sides, sorrowfully and painfully staying put.

original: 爾時復有諸天大眾釋提桓因等。
analyzed: 爾時復有諸天大眾釋提桓因等。
translated: At that time, there were also the great multitudes of devas, Śakra Devānām-Indra and others.
All came to make offerings.
There was only the Brahmā King with the Topknot.
Leading the celestial maidens.
Surrounding and sitting on the four sides.
The celestial maidens in front and back, in multitudes of thousands of myriads of koṭīs.
Together enjoying each other.

original: 聞如來入般涅槃而不來覲省。
analyzed: 聞如來入般涅槃而不來覲省。
translated: Hearing that the Tathāgata was entering parinirvāṇa, yet not coming to pay respects.
At that time, the great multitudes said.
Today, the Tathāgata is about to enter parinirvāṇa.
Why does that Brahmā King not come?
That king must have a mind of self-conceit.
And does not come here.
Our assembly of disciples drives the minor mantra immortals.
Go and get him.

original: 作是語已策百千眾呪仙。
analyzed: 作是語已策百千眾呪仙。
translated: Having said this, he dispatched hundreds of thousands of mantra immortals.
To that place.

original: 乃見種種不淨而為城塹。
analyzed: 乃見種種不淨而為城塹。
translated: He saw various impurities serving as the moat of the city.
When the immortal saw this,
He violated the mantra and died.
At that time, the great assembly marveled at the unprecedented event.
Again, he dispatched innumerable vajra [warriors].
Also, he ordered them to go while holding the mantra.
Up to seven days, no one was able to obtain him.
The great assembly, seeing this, doubled their grief.

original: 爾時大眾同聲而說偈言。
analyzed: 爾時大眾同聲而說偈言。
translated: At that time, the great assembly spoke a verse with the same voice, saying:

original: 苦哉大聖尊　　入真何太速
analyzed: 苦哉大聖尊　　入真何太速
translated: Alas, the great sage, entering the true [nirvāṇa], how too quickly!

original: 諸天猶決定　　天人追喚得
analyzed: 諸天猶決定　　天人追喚得
translated: The gods are still determined, the gods and humans call out and can obtain [him].

original: 痛哉天中天　　入真如火滅
analyzed: 痛哉天中天　　入真如火滅
translated: Alas, the god among gods, entering the true [nirvāṇa] is like fire going out.
At that time, after the great assembly had spoken this verse,
they choked with sobs and wept even more sadly.
At that time, the Tathāgata, having pity for the great assembly,
immediately used the spiritual power of great universal knowledge.
In accordance with the mind on the left, he manifested the indestructible vajra.
He immediately rose from his seat in the assembly
and said to the great assembly:

original: 我有大神呪能取彼梵王。
analyzed: 我有大神呪能取彼梵王。
translated: I have a great divine mantra that can capture that Brahma King.

original: 作是語已即於大眾之中顯大神通。
analyzed: 作是語已即於大眾之中顯大神通。
translated: Having said this, he immediately manifested great spiritual powers in the midst of the great assembly.

original: 變此三千大千世界六返震動。
analyzed: 變此三千大千世界六返震動。
translated: He caused the three thousand great one thousand worlds to shake six times.

original: 天宮龍宮諸鬼神宮皆悉崩摧。
analyzed: 天宮龍宮諸鬼神宮皆悉崩摧。
translated: The heavenly palaces, nāga palaces, and various ghost palaces all collapsed and were destroyed.
He then soared up to where the Brahma King was
and pointed at him with his finger.
That ugly and filthy thing turned into the great earth.
At that time, Vajra arrived there and said to him:

original: 汝大愚癡我如來欲入涅槃。
analyzed: 汝大愚癡我如來欲入涅槃。
translated: You are greatly foolish. The Tathāgata wishes to enter nirvana.
Why do you not leave?
He then used the indestructible power of the vajra
and slightly pointed at him with his finger.
Brahma-king gave rise to the aspiration and went to where the Tathāgata was.
At that time, the great assembly praised, saying,
Great strong man, you are able to have this spiritual power.
Take that Brahma-king and bring him here.
Then Vajra replied,
If there are sentient beings in the world

original: 被諸天惡魔一切外道所惱亂者但誦我呪十萬遍。
analyzed: 被諸天惡魔一切外道所惱亂者但誦我呪十萬遍。
translated: who are disturbed by the evil demons of the heavens and all non-Buddhists, if they merely recite my mantra ten thousand times,

original: 我自現身令一切有情隨意滿足。
analyzed: 我自現身令一切有情隨意滿足。
translated: I will manifest my body myself and cause all sentient beings to have their wishes fulfilled.
Forever free from poverty, always causing peace and happiness.
The mantra is as follows.
First give rise to this great vow.

original: 南無我本師釋迦牟尼佛。
analyzed: 南無我本師釋迦牟尼佛。
translated: Homage to my original teacher Shakyamuni Buddha.
After the Tathagata's extinction, uphold this mantra.
Vow to deliver all beings.
Cause the Buddha Dharma to not perish and remain in the world for a long time.
Having spoken this vow,

original: 即說大圓滿陀羅尼神呪穢跡真言曰。
analyzed: 即說大圓滿陀羅尼神呪穢跡真言曰。
translated: He then spoke the great perfect dharani divine mantra and the mantra of the defiled traces, saying:

original: 唵𠲽咶啒㖀摩訶鉢囉二合𭉆那𠵨三音吻汁吻四音微咭微摩那栖六音嗚深慕七音啒㖀𤙖𤙖泮泮泮娑訶時彼金剛說此呪已。🔽復作是言。🔽我於如來滅後常誦此呪。
analyzed: 唵𠲽咶啒㖀摩訶鉢囉二合𭉆那𠵨三音吻汁吻四音微咭微摩那栖六音嗚深慕七音啒㖀𤙖𤙖泮泮泮娑訶時彼金剛說此呪已。 復作是言。 我於如來滅後常誦此呪。
translated: Oṃ jighra jighra mahāpracṇa chinna mukha mukha viṣa viṣa mānaśa śvāsa śvāsa hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā When Vajrapāṇi had recited this mantra,🔽he further said,🔽After the Tathāgata's nirvāṇa, I will always recite this mantra.🔽

original: 無問淨與不淨隨意驅使。
analyzed: 無問淨與不淨隨意驅使。
translated: Whether pure or impure, drive them as you wish.
I will follow and fulfill all wishes.
If you wish to make a withered tree grow branches and leaves,
Take one tael of white glue incense.
Rub it on the tree's heart.
Incanted the willow branch over the tree one hundred times.

original: 日三時至滿三日即生華果。
analyzed: 日三時至滿三日即生華果。
translated: Three times a day for three days, then it will grow flowers and fruits.
If you wish to make a dried-up spring flow with water,
Encircle it with clean ash.

original: 即井華水三斗置泉水中。
analyzed: 即井華水三斗置泉水中。
translated: Then place three dou of well water in the spring water.
Incanted it one hundred and eight times at the ying time.
The water gushes out like a car wheel.
If you wish to make a withered mountain grow grass and trees,
Take a sword of fine steel.
Encircle the mountain in the four directions.
Incanted it three thousand times for seven days, then it will grow.
If you wish to make wild beasts submit,

original: 取安悉香燒向有獸住處呪一千遍。
analyzed: 取安悉香燒向有獸住處呪一千遍。
translated: Take asafetida incense and burn it facing where the beasts reside, incanted it one thousand times.🔽Those beasts will gather
At night,
In front of the practitioner's gate.
They will submit like the six domestic animals among humans.
They will be driven as one wishes, never to be abandoned.
If one wants to make the yakshas come and submit themselves,
Take ten peach branches and cut them to the same length.
Take one dou of water and boil it down to five dou.
Soak the peach and willow branches and remove them.

original: 以丁香三大兩乳頭香三大兩白膠香三大兩。
analyzed: 以丁香三大兩乳頭香三大兩白膠香三大兩。
translated: Take three taels of cloves, three taels of breast-shaped incense, and three taels of white glue incense.
Later, mix with willow water and boil it down to five dou.
Then place it in a broken basin.
Take one peach branch three chi long.
Stir the water and recite the mantra one hundred times.
All yakshas and rakshasas will come and appear.
They will speak with the practitioner.
Requesting to be the practitioner's attendant first.

original: 若令諸惡鬼神毒蛇蝎猛獸等毒以滅者。
analyzed: 若令諸惡鬼神毒蛇蝎猛獸等毒以滅者。
translated: If one wants to destroy the poisons of evil ghosts, poisonous snakes, scorpions, and ferocious beasts,
Take clean ash and surround the inhabited holes and gaps.
They will all come out.
Silently recite the mantra one hundred times.
Those snakes and all poisonous beasts,
Each will extinguish their poisonous mind and dare not harm people.
They will quickly attain liberation.
If you want to prevent a vicious dog from harming people,
Take a portion of food, recite the mantra seven times, and give it to the dog.
It will never harm people again and will not bark.
If you want to subdue a wicked person,

original: 書前人姓名置呪人脚下。
analyzed: 書前人姓名置呪人脚下。
translated: Write down the name of the person in front of the mantra practitioner's feet.
Recite the mantra one hundred times.
Think in your mind of that person, and they will immediately come.
They will be subdued and abandon their hateful mind.
If you want to cause two people to dislike each other,
Write down the names of those two people.

original: 於自足下呪二百一十八遍。
analyzed: 於自足下呪二百一十八遍。
translated: Place them under your own feet and recite the mantra two hundred and eighteen times.

original: 其人等便相離背不相愛敬。
analyzed: 其人等便相離背不相愛敬。
translated: Those two people will then turn against each other and will not love or respect each other.

original: 若有相憎人令相愛敬者。
analyzed: 若有相憎人令相愛敬者。
translated: If you want to cause two people who dislike each other to love and respect each other,
Write down their names and surnames.
Place them under your own feet and recite the mantra one hundred and eight times.

original: 其人便相愛重永不相捨。🔽若有未安樂之人令安樂者。
analyzed: 其人便相愛重永不相捨。🔽若有未安樂之人令安樂者。
translated: Those two people will then love and cherish each other and will never part.
Take the name of the other person and write it on the sole [of the foot].
Recite the mantra three hundred times.
For that person, make a great vow.
At that time, I will deliver myself.
Eloquence is unobstructed, following the practitioner's intention.
Whatever is needed, I will provide it all.

original: 若持呪人求種種珍寶摩尼如意珠等者。
analyzed: 若持呪人求種種珍寶摩尼如意珠等者。
translated: If the mantra practitioner seeks various precious treasures, maṇi jewels, wish-fulfilling jewels, and so forth,
Simply recite the mantra with utmost sincerity, setting a limit on the number of times.
I will then deliver myself and fulfill their wishes.
If you wish to cure someone's illness,
Make the sudden illness mudrā.
First, with the index and middle fingers of the left hand,
Press on the lifeline.

original: 印呪之一百遍以印頓病人七下立差。
analyzed: 印呪之一百遍以印頓病人七下立差。
translated: Recite the mudrā mantra one hundred times and strike the suddenly ill person seven times, and they will immediately recover.
If the patient is about to die,

original: 先於禁五路印然後治之。
analyzed: 先於禁五路印然後治之。
translated: First make the five paths of prohibition mudrā, and then treat them.
It is the not dying mudrā.

original: 如是先准印以無名指屈向掌中。
analyzed: 如是先准印以無名指屈向掌中。
translated: In this way, first make the mudrā with the ring finger bent towards the palm,

original: 竪小指呪之百遍其患速除。
analyzed: 竪小指呪之百遍其患速除。
translated: And erect the little finger. Recite the mantra one hundred times, and their illness will quickly be cured.

original: 若治邪病者。🔽但於病患人頭邊。
analyzed: 若治邪病者。 但於病患人頭邊。
translated: If treating a case of demonic illness,
simply burn ankus incense by the head of the afflicted person🔽and recite the mantra.
It will be cured immediately.
If it is a case of insect poisoning,

original: 書患人名字紙上呪之即差。
analyzed: 書患人名字紙上呪之即差。
translated: write the afflicted person's name on a piece of paper, recite the mantra over it, and they will recover.
Treating cases of jingmei illness is also the same method.
If treating a case of fulen illness,

original: 書患人姓名及作病鬼姓名。
analyzed: 書患人姓名及作病鬼姓名。
translated: write the afflicted person's name and the name of the ghost causing the illness.
Buried under the afflicted person's bed, recite the mantra over it.

original: 其鬼遠奉名字自出現身。
analyzed: 其鬼遠奉名字自出現身。
translated: The ghost will respectfully present the names from afar and appear in person.
Then have that ghost look into the affairs of the three periods of time.

original: 一一具說向人其病速差。
analyzed: 一一具說向人其病速差。
translated: Each and every detail will be fully explained to the person, and the illness will quickly be cured.
If there is an illness of epidemic disease,
the mantra master will see it and it will be cured.

original: 若欲令行病鬼王不入界者。
analyzed: 若欲令行病鬼王不入界者。
translated: If you wish to prevent the king of wandering ghosts from entering the boundary,

original: 於十齋日誦我此呪一千八遍。
analyzed: 於十齋日誦我此呪一千八遍。
translated: on the ten observance days, recite this mantra of mine 1,080 times.
